title: Solution Consultant – Salesforce
description:
**Solution Consultant – Salesforce in Stockholm**




 Would you like to join the leading business technology company in the Nordics? Do you speak technology fluently and is interested to create lasting business value? If yes, keep reading!
 



 We at Sofigate are on a growth journey and we’re looking for a Solution Consultant to join our team. We’re looking for someone with a growth mindset, and a genuine interest in how technology and business together can create value.
 



**What’s in it for you?** 




 As a Sofigator, you get the opportunity to work with knowledgeable and driven colleagues, develop and challenge yourself and create sustainable value for our customers. We have an international, vibrant and fun culture with great openness and flexibility. We value every Sofigator and strive to build a diverse, equal, and inclusive workplace where everyone’s voice is heard, and where everyone can become the best versions of themselves. We value a healthy work life balance and support you in maintaining it.
 



 Growth is not just a corporate thing for us – it is personal. There is so much to explore and learn within our community, and together with our customers, that having a bit of fun is unavoidable.
 



 We do not leave the future up to chance. We take ownership of it. You can, too. Own your future!
 



**Who are we looking for?** 




 As a Salesforce Solution Consultant at Sofigate, you will play a key role in delivering impactful Salesforce projects, working closely with clients, colleagues, and Salesforce itself. Your focus will be on designing and building smart, effective solutions across Salesforce platforms like Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and beyond, helping clients unlock real business value. You are already hooked on AI and curious to deliver solutions based on new technologies like Agentforce.
 



 As a trusted consultant you will be part of client implementations, discovery sessions, and solution design—making sure each delivery meets business needs and best practices. You’ll collaborate with senior architects, project managers, and other experts, learning and growing your Salesforce expertise along the way.
 



 You should feel confident navigating customer dialogues, supporting pre-sales activities, and building trusted relationships with clients. Depending on your seniority you are either developing to become a project manager who can lead major engagements or a real expert within the Salesforce platform acting as a solution architect.
   

  

 We value experience, but more importantly, we value the right attitude. You will succeed with us if you:
 


* Translate client challenges into effective Salesforce solutions through workshops and discovery sessions.
* Design, configure, and support Salesforce solutions in close collaboration with other team members.
* Act as a trusted advisor to clients on Salesforce best practices, scalability, and governance.
* Stay updated with Salesforce innovations and maintain core certifications.
* Support pre-sales activities by providing solution insights and assisting in proposal development.
* Work collaboratively with Sofigate’s teams, sharing knowledge and creative ideas.
* Represent Sofigate with professionalism and a passion for innovation within the Salesforce ecosystem.



**Take ownership of your work. Own your future**
 As a Sofigator, you get the opportunity to work with skilled and driven colleagues, develop and challenge yourself and create sustainable value for our customers. We have an international and vibrant culture with great openness and flexibility. We value every Sofigator and strive to build a diverse, equal, and inclusive workplace where everyone’s voice is heard, and where everyone can become the best version of themselves. We value a healthy work-life balance and support you in maintaining it.
 



 Growth is not just a corporate thing for us – it is personal. There is so much to explore and learn within our community and together with our customers, that having a bit of fun is unavoidable.
 



**We would like to hear from you** 




 If you want to join our journey to dare, care and grow together with our clients and fellow Sofigators, we are eager to hear more from you. Please, tell us more about your background, competences and your motivation to be part of our growth story.
 



 If you have any questions please contact Johan Neumann, Business Lead Salesforce johan.neumann[at]sofigate.com
   

  

**About Sofigate** 






 We change the way how business and technology leaders co-create business technology capabilities and lead digital transformation. Our 700+ experts in Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Hungary and Poland help you be at ease with the speed of change.
 



 By combining our transformation expertise with low/no-code platforms and generative AI, we ensure a faster time-to-value for our customers.
 



 We do not leave the future up to chance. We take ownership of it. You can, too.

title: IT Security Engineer
description:
**About the team:**
 The Schibsted Media Cyber Security team is looking for an IT Security Engineer to protect the organization and the publishers along their mission for free and independent press. Located in Sweden, the team is responsible for designing, building and maintaining core cybersecurity tools and services for the company and journalists as well as supporting the development of safe products and services to our customers. We are part of the tech department, the cybersecurity team collaborates with the other part of the organisation: journalists, editors, IT, AI, legal, infrastructure, network, user devices, collaboration software, …
   

  

**What will you do in this role?**
 As an IT Security Engineer, you will be responsible for the development of critical IT Security functions within the company. In this role, you will be analysing, designing, implementing, and maintaining security solutions to protect our organisation's IT infrastructure and assets. Your expertise will be vital in ensuring the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of our systems and data.
   

  

 Your main responsibilities will be to:
   

  

* Perform security assessments and identify areas for improvements and designing strategies to mitigate risks effectively.
* Drive and improve enterprise-wide security initiatives, including threat detection and prevention systems, incident response functions, and vulnerability management
* Engage in Incident Response in collaboration with NOC & SOC to mitigate and investigate security incidents using threat hunting and digital forensics methodology.
* Design and implement robust security systems and architectures, including network segmentation, firewalls, intrusion detection and prevention systems, VPNs, and endpoint protection solutions.
* Improve security monitoring of the network , cloud, IAM and endpoint system environment to detect and prevent threats quicker and more accurately.
* Perform security due-diligence of and define security procedures towards external vendors and third party providers to prevent supply-chain threats.
* Write security documentation, including policies, standards, procedures, and guidelines, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards.
* Collaborate with external auditors and regulatory bodies to facilitate security audits and assessments.
* Contribute to the development of security training and education programs tailored to e.g. journalists and developers.
* Depending on your experience, provide guidance and mentorship to junior security team members, fostering a culture of continuous learning and development.


**Key competencies:**
* Strong academic background within the areas of cyber security, computer science or other relevant field
* 1-3 years of experience in an IT Security role, with practical experience in implementing security controls and technologies.
* Proficiency in network and system administration, with hands-on experience managing security tools and technologies such as SIEM, DLP, EDR, and vulnerability scanning tools.
* Strong understanding of networking protocols, operating systems, and cloud computing platforms, with the ability to analyse and troubleshoot security-related issues.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to prioritise and manage multiple tasks effectively.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.


**Nice to have:**
* Relevant certifications such as CompTIA Security+, GHEC or CEH would be appreciated.
* A good understanding of the threat landscape of a media house.
* Systems programming experience such as Python or Go.
* Experience provisioning and maintaining cloud environments through IaC frameworks such as Terraform.
* Previous experience working with EDR, vulnerability scanners or SIEM.
* Experience working with threat intelligence for tactical and strategic improvements.

title: ESS Solutions Engineer - Sweden
description:
**Your mission**
 This is a first-class opportunity to join Sungrow Power EMEA as a principal engineer, specialising in Battery Energy Storage System to join our ESS technical Team based in Sweden. As a principal engineer you will focus on technical design and ESS customized solution proposal to support the delivery of the energy storage (mainly battery energy storage system--BESS) assignment and take a leading position in supporting Sungrow ESS European market and development. You will also support the solar PV, wind and other renewable energy projects for the group.
   

  

**In General, Your Responsibilities Will Be**
* Managing and performing high quality technical advisory works for the pre-sale’s activities
* Project manager and interfacing between engineering disciplines (ESS electric, mechanical, civil and control scheme)
* Provide technical input from initial assessment through to technical and economic feasibility of the project and integration with other electrical or generating plants as necessary
* Review overall project conceptual design, detailed design, and design and suggest technical and design improvement for ESS projects
* Preparation and management of specifications, tendering, negotiation, and selection of battery storage system plant
* Due diligence of ESS projects and support customer and lender throughout the financial close process including technical liaison with legal and financial advisors
* Knowledge of renewable generation utility network connection quality studies and PCS dynamic performance approval process would be an advantage strength
* ESS technical specifications establishment as per European countries regulation and international standards (IEC/IEEE)


**Your profile**
 All Good, That Sounded Great Right? Now Let`s Have a Look At Your Background, So You Get a Feeling If This Could Be The Right Challenge For You
   

  

* Bachelor’s degree (Engineering) or equivalent (electrical preferred)
* Experience on BESS technology, Mix of UK and overseas (European) experience would be ideal.
* An in-depth knowledge and field expertise regarding to BESS technologies including the emerging technologies and the international market
* Technical advisory experience towards investors, project developers and experience with BESS plant design dealing with technical advisory support
* International solar PV or Hybrid projects development and delivery experience
* Proven experience in technical review communication with client and other project parties (utilities, BoP, EPC, etc)
* Language: English and Swedish at least C1, other languages are always great to have!


**Why us?**
 This decade might be overshadowed by Covid19, but sooner or later we will beat and overcome that son of a germ, am I right?
   

  

 But the true topic for this decade lies in
 **energy** 
 ！
   

  

 We Are More Than Happy To State That Not Only We Are Leading This Discourse, We Also Offer The Fitting Solutions For It. We Have The Strongest PV-Inverter R&D There Is And Became The World`s Biggest Inverter Manufacturer, Which We Are Extremely Proud Of!And Now, For This Decade, We Are Increasing Our Game, And You, You Might Become Part Of It! Besides That, Many Things Await You
   

  

* Opportunities for Career advancement
* Bonus payment based on pre-agreed and signed KPI agreements
* A multinational team awaits You with lots of european and transeuropean exchange!
* Possibility for technical and commercial knowledge increasement in regard to string inverters, central inverters, inverter stations including transformer and switch gear and storage solutions
* Technical and commercial training in our headquarter in Germany and even visits to the big R&D facility in China!


**About Us**
 We are a green tech company with young creative minds.
   

  

 We are fighting every day to make our mission happen –
 **Clean Power for All** 
 !
   

  

 With 650+GW of clean power presently installed worldwide, we are on the road to success!
   

  

 Welcome at Sungrow
   

  

 Founded in 1997 by University Professor Cao Renxian, Sungrow is a leader in the research and development of solar inverters with the largest dedicated R&D team in the industry and a broad product portfolio offering PV inverter solutions and energy storage systems for utility-scale, commercial & industrial, and residential applications, as well as internationally recognized floating PV plant solutions, NEV driving solutions, EV charging solutions and renewable hydrogen production systems.
   

  

 Want to know more? Check out what working with us is like!

title: Digital & Solution Manager
description:
**About Abbott**
 Abbott is a global healthcare leader dedicated to helping people live more fully at all stages of life. Our portfolio of life-changing technologies spans diagnostics, medical devices, nutritionals, and branded generic medicines. With 113,000 colleagues serving people in more than 160 countries, we are committed to making a lasting impact on global health.
   

  

**About Abbott Diabetes Care**
 Abbott Diabetes Care is a global leader in diabetes management, dedicated to helping people with diabetes lead healthier, happier lives. Our innovative product portfolio includes the FreeStyle family of glucose monitoring systems, which provide accurate and consistent glucose readings to help patients and healthcare professionals manage diabetes more effectively. Through continuous research and technological advancements, Abbott Diabetes Care aims to set the standard for diabetes care, offering state-of-the-art tools and support to improve patient outcomes.
   

  

 We are seeking a
 **Digital and Solution Manager**
 This role involves leading the implementation of Abbott Diabetes Care’s digital health solutions within healthcare environments and electronic medical record platforms in Sweden. The Digital and Solution Manager will work strategically to ensure our digital tools and continuous glucose monitoring technology optimize healthcare efficiency while driving access to Abbott's complete diabetes care solutions.
   

  

**Roles And Responsibilities**
* Lead the integration and implementation of digital health solutions across Sweden
* Act as the primary contact for product knowledge related to digital solutions
* Support healthcare institutions with seamless technical integration and training
* Provide expert application knowledge and guidance on digital health solutions
* Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders in healthcare and information technology
* Develop customer accounts in collaboration with the sales team
* Train and support the sales team on digital solutions, updates, and new features
* Drive sales initiatives to optimize healthcare using digital tools and technology
* Develop business strategies to enhance digital health adoption
* Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders for successful product implementation
* Support healthcare providers in transitioning to demand-driven care models
* Travel across Sweden three to four days per week in a field-based role


**Your Profile**
* Background in technology, sales, or healthcare-related fields
* Knowledge of information technology project management, preferably within healthcare
* Sales experience in pharmaceutical or medical technology industries
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent communication and relationship-building abilities
* Ability to collaborate cross-functionally with internal and external stakeholders
* Proactive mindset, willing to challenge and innovate for better healthcare solutions
* Fluent in Swedish and English


**Our Offer**
* A collaborative and diverse work environment
* Opportunities for personal and career development
* A challenging and dynamic international position
* Competitive benefits and employment conditions
* Access to Abbott’s extensive professional networks


**Why Join Abbott**
* Be part of a global leader in healthcare innovation
* Work with a dedicated team improving patient lives
* Engage in continuous learning and professional growth


 Apply now and be part of the future of digital healthcare!

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
Our client is a growing tech company working in the energy space. They are on a mission to focus on making energy systems smarter, more efficient, and more secure using software and data.
 



  





 If you care about tackling real-world challenges like climate change and energy resilience and want to be part of a team that is practical, curious, and hands-on, this could be for you.
 



  





**The role** 



* We are looking for someone with a solid engineering background and a collaborative mindset.
* This role sits in a small but busy team responsible for building the tools and infrastructure that help us analyze energy systems and make better decisions. You will be working on everything from building out our platform to improving how we move and manage data across the company.
* It’s a mix of hands-on engineering, collaboration, and problem-solving.



  





**Here is some of what you will be doing** 



* Building and maintaining a data platform that scales with our needs
* Writing and managing pipelines to collect, clean, and organize data
* Helping to define and improve data quality standards
* Working closely with others (both technical and non-technical) to make sure our data and models are easy to access!
* Being part of technical discussions and decision-making in the team



  





 We are looking for someone with a solid engineering background and a collaborative mindset.
 



  





**You don’t need to tick every box—but if this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you:** 



* Comfortable writing Python and working with GCP (or similar)
* About 5 years of experience in software engineering
* Can work independently, but knows when to reach out and loop others in
* Curious and thoughtful to think about the bigger picture, not just the code
* Likes working in a small, flat team where everyone pitches in
* Open to feedback, open with feedback



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* Your work will get used and have an impact; this isn’t a big corporate machine
* You will be part of a respectful, friendly team where people help each other out
* There’s room to grow, learn, and shape how things are done here



  





 If this sounds like a place you would thrive and enjoy working, we would love to hear from you.

title: Solution Architect for the Commercial AI and Data Office
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines towards providing profitable and sustainable transport solutions. Within the TRATON Group, together with our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions.
   

  

 Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

  

  

**This Is Us**
 At the Commercial AI and Data Office at Scania Sales & Marketing, we have four missions; The first one is to provide a common Data and AI foundation for Scania from a commercial perspective, the second is to accelerate Data, Analytics and AI adoption across the Scania business by building and operating AI and Data solutions. The third mission is to drive the transformation of Scania into an AI and Data-driven company, giving expertise and hands-on support in building AI and Data solutions, driving data standardization, navigating laws and regulation, and set best practice and way of working with AI architecture and Data Mesh. Finally, we have a fourth mission, which is to structure, quality assure and automate our Master Data cross Scania, for optimized and aligned analytical utilization.
   

  

 Now, we are looking for a Solution Architect to join one of the teams at the Commercial AI and Data Office.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 We are looking for an experienced Solution Architect to join our Commercial AI and Data Foundation team. You will be responsible for creating architectural blueprints that ensure performance, security, cost, reliability, and sustainability from an architectural perspective. You will support a data-driven approach and take a holistic view of our systems throughout Scania’s commercial functions. Your primary focus will be on supporting the translation of the data and AI architecture vision and needs into concrete applications, integration, and infrastructure patterns, ensuring that our solutions are secure, scalable, and deployable. An important part of the job is to harmonize the system landscape from an AI and Data perspective. You will also coordinate with architects across networks and business functions, collaborating with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Architectural recommendations: Make architectural recommendations based on performance, security, cost, reliability, and sustainability, supporting a data-driven approach and taking a holistic view.
* Turn the data blueprint into deployable designs: Translate the data architecture vision into concrete application, integration, and infrastructure patterns, focusing on security, scalability, and deployability.
* Align solutions with enterprise standards: Ensure that our architectural designs follow standards, group policies, and guardrails. Ensure solutions comply with regulations, including access control, auditing, and life cycle management.
* Oversee reusable reference implementations: Guide the creation of code templates, Infrastructure as Code (IaC) modules, and CI/CD pipelines.
* Set and aligns non-functional requirements: Optimize performance, scalability, and availability.
* Mediate cross networks: Coordinate with architects across networks and business functions.


**Who You Are**
 You are an experienced Solution Architect with a strong background in designing robust architectures for different applications. You have proven experience in making architectural decisions and translating data architecture visions into concrete applications, integrations, and infrastructure patterns, with a focus on security, scalability, and deployability. Hands-on experience with cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure is required, along with data streaming technologies such as Kafka. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or Scala is a plus.
   

  

 As a strong communicator and collaborator, you can coordinate with architects across networks and business functions. You are confident in working effectively with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements and translate them into technical specifications and blueprints, along with providing mentorship and guidance.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

  

  

**We look forward to your application!**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-05-21. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description:
**Join Quartr’s Data Tooling Team!**
 Quartr is a software company serving the world of finance. The Quartr ecosystem gives millions of professional investors and corporate professionals worldwide easy access to first-party information from public companies through a variety of services – including a web app, a mobile app, and an API solution.
   

  

 Our Data Tooling team is dedicated to developing and enhancing the tools crucial for our in-house data sourcing operations. We are looking for a talented individual to join this dynamic team.
   

  

**Desired qualities and skill sets:**
* You take ownership and are focused on the needs of our internal users
* Mindful of the bigger picture and the impact of technical decisions
* Eager to learn and embrace challenges
* Excellent at communicating with others
* Passionate about our mission
* At least 2 years of professional experience


**Required technical skills:**
* TypeScript
* Node.js
* React
* Docker


**Preferred technical skills:**
* Next.js
* Cloud experience (preferably AWS)
* Knowledge of other programming languages


 At Quartr, we believe in individual freedom and trust that you know what work setup suits you best. Whether you prefer to work remotely, be based at one of our offices in Stockholm or Gothenburg, or something in between, the choice is yours. However, you must be based in Sweden with a valid work permit.
   

  

**What we offer:**
* Competitive salary
* Company option plan
* Top-notch equipment of your choice
* Wellness allowance
* Occupational pension


 By joining Quartr, you'll be part of a rapid growth story in the global investor relations space, where no day is like the other – in a good way.
   

  

**Note: We aren’t looking for consultants or assistance from recruitment agencies.**
****Learn more about Quartr****
**Quartr x Perplexity** 
 our partnership with Perplexity
   

  

**Quartr secures Investment from Altos Ventures** 
 partnering with respected San Fransisco-based VC firm to further accelerate growth and continue transforming qualitative market research
   

  

**Fourth Most Innovative Company in Personal Finance 2024** 
 as recognized by Fast Company

title: Data Platform Architect
description:
At Sogeti, we believe the best is inside every one of us. Whether you are early in your career or at the top of your game, we’ll encourage you to fulfill your potential to be better. Through our shared passion for technology, our entrepreneurial culture , and our focus on continuous learning, we’ll provide everything you need to do your best work and become the best you can be.
   

  

**Data Platform Architect**
**Din roll:**
 Vi söker dig som är en erfaren Dataplattformsarkitekt och som är grym på att vägleda kring och skapa skalbara, robusta och moderna dataplattformar. Vi söker dig som brinner för att skapa värde för våra kunder och som både kan leda och vara "hands-on" i att designa, bygga, migrera till och optimera dataplattformar. Vi söker dig som kombinerar djup teknisk kompetens med en stark kommunikativ förmåga.
   

  

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**
* Designa, implementera och optimera dataplattformar.
* Arbeta med dataarkitektur och datamodellering till säkerhetsmodeller och datastyrning.
* Skapa lösningsförslag, leda implementationer och säkerställa kvalitet i leveranserna.
* Val av teknologier och verktyg, definiera scheman och etablera datastyrningspraxis för att säkerställa säker och skalbar arkitektur.
* Bygga och underhålla ETL-flöden, extrahera, transformera och ladda data från olika källor med fokus på pålitlighet och effektivitet.
* Implementera säkerhetspolicys och säkerställa att plattformen följer dataskyddsregler som GDPR.
* Utveckla strategier för datalagring och optimering för snabb åtkomst och kostnadseffektivitet.
* Stödja flera datakällor, designa framtidssäkra lösningar för datahantering, dataflöden och integrationer.
* Presentera tekniska lösningar på ett engagerande sätt för olika målgrupper.
* Bygga och leda team samt driva leveranser mot uppsatta mål.


**Din profil:**
* Minst fem års erfarenhet av att designa, implementera och leda migrering, införande och förvaltning av dataplattformslösningar.
* Erfarenhet av tekniker som Teradata, Databricks, Snowflake, Synapse, Ab Initio, Mainframe, Informatica, PowerCenter, PowerShell, SQL, Data Warehouse, Data Lake, Data Fabric, ETL, Power BI och DataOps.
* Förmåga att agera rådgivande och driva diskussioner med olika intressenter, både under införande och i leveranser.
* Passion för data och tekniska lösningar och en vilja att arbeta både strategiskt och operativt.
* Stark lagspelare med förmåga att samarbeta i tvärfunktionella agila team.
* Självständig, initiativrik och en problemlösare som balanserar detaljer med helhetsperspektiv.
* Tala och skriva flytande svenska och engelska.


**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**
**Innovativ miljö:** 
 Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.
   

  

**Karriärutveckling** 
 : Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.
   

  

**Flexibelt arbete:** 
 Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.
   

  

 Teamkänsla: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.
   

  

**Ansökan:**
 Vi välkomnar varmt din ansökan idag, urvalet sker löpande! Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Team Manager, Johan Alsén på johan.alsen@sogeti.se
   

  

 Part of the Capgemini Group, Sogeti makes business value through technology for organizations that need to implement innovation at speed and want a local partner with global scale. With a hands-on culture and close proximity to its clients, Sogeti implements solutions that will help organizations work faster, better, and smarter. By combining its agility and speed of implementation through a DevOps approach, Sogeti delivers innovative solutions in quality engineering, cloud and application development, all driven by AI, data and automation.

title: Software Architect - Backend
description:
**Position Summary**
 We’re looking for a Software Architect to guide the technical direction of our B2B SaaS platform. You will take on significant responsibility in setting priorities, defining best practices, and ensuring successful software delivery. Our product is unique, demanding a high level of collaboration and advanced problem-solving. You’ll work closely with our exceptionally skilled architect and a senior team of developers to refine and shape robust, scalable solutions. As our R&D department evolves, we're looking for someone who embraces change, adapts quickly to shifting priorities, and brings a forward-thinking mindset
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Technical Direction & Prioritization – Shape the overall architectural vision while ensuring scalability and maintainability. Translate business goals into practical solutions that drive long-term success.
* Architect & Implement – Design and refine robust, cloud-native solutions (AWS, Docker, Kubernetes). Leverage front-end or full-stack insights to ensure seamless user experiences when necessary.
* Operational Coordination – Work closely with the Product team to align development efforts with business objectives. Document architectural decisions to provide clarity and consistency across teams.
* Cross-Functional Collaboration – Partner with DevOps and other technical teams to maintain efficient CI/CD pipelines and deployment processes. Communicate complex technical challenges and solutions in a clear, constructive manner.
* Continuous Improvement – Stay ahead of SaaS, cloud, and CPQ trends, identifying opportunities to enhance platform performance, security, and scalability.


**Skills & Qualifications**
* 10+ years of experience in software development, ideally within complex systems.
* Strong architectural mindset, identifying synergies across products (CPQ, VIZ, CAD) and future solutions.
* Proven track record in architecting and delivering SaaS solutions (CPQ experience is a plus).
* Expertise in cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP), containerization (Kubernetes, Docker), and scalable database design (SQL/NoSQL).
* Backend development expertise (Java or similar) with a willingness to engage in front-end when needed.
* Fluent in English; Swedish is a plus.


**The Recruitment Process Consists Of**
* Screening call with Talent Acquisition
* First interview with our hiring manager
* Technical interview
* Interview with our CPO
* Reference check


**Why Tacton?**
* 33 days of paid time off – 30 vacation days plus 3 extra to make sure you get the rest you deserve.
* Premium occupational pension – Our pension plan goes beyond ITP1, with higher employer contributions depending on your age and salary level.
* Generous wellness allowance – 5,000 SEK annually to support your health and wellbeing.
* Weekly treats – Fika one week, breakfast the next – because good food brings people together.
* Private healthcare insurance – Skip the waiting lines and get quick access to private medical care, including specialist consultations and treatments.
* Parental leave top-up – We top up your parental leave so you receive up to 90% of your base salary for up to 6 months, helping you focus on your family without financial stress
* A hybrid workspace - 3 days a week at our Stockholm office, to foster direct knowledge sharing and innovation.


 This role is based in Stockholm, where we have invested in creating our unique home right next to Hötorget station.
   

  

 Tacton is a leading SaaS company within CPQ and Design Automation making sales simple for complex products.

title: Lösningsarkitekt
description:
Till ett uppdrag hos vår kund i Stockholm söker vi nu en lösningsarkitekt. Kunden är mitt i en spännande tillväxtresa med fler kunder och ett utökat erbjudande. Med vår växande kundbas, snabba teknikskiften och nya metoder för finansiell brottslighet, stärker vi nu upp oss ytterligare med ett team vars fokus är att bekämpa penningtvätt och finansiering av terrorism.
   

  

 Teamet söker en erfaren Lösningsarkitekt som vill göra direkt samhällsnytta och utveckla långsiktiga, innovativa lösningar som möter dagens krav och rustar oss för framtiden. Har du erfarenhet av modern utveckling och arkitektur i en tekniskt ledande roll, och ett stort engagemang för att förebygga finansiella brott, kan det här vara din nästa möjlighet.
   

  

 Plats: Stockholm
   

  

 Omfattning: 100%
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**
 Som Lösningsarkitekt kommer du, tillsammans med ditt team och i nära samarbete med interna experter, bygga skalbara system för kundkännedom, riskbedömning och transaktionsövervakning med fokus på att bekämpa penningtvätt. Du kommer att vara med och leda utvecklingsprocessen samt utforma en ny domänmodell och systemdesign. Ditt ansvar täcker hela spektrumet från systemarkitektur och design till praktisk kodning och implementering.
   

  

*I din roll som Lösningsarkitekt ingår bland annat att:*
* Driva arkitektur och tekniska vägval - bedöma risker, fördelar och nackdelar med olika lösningsalternativ samt utvärdera och välja leverantörer i de lägen där tredjepartssystem kan komma att bli aktuellt.
* Säkerställa att systemen inom området har rätt kvalitet med hänsyn tagen till krav på t ex tillgänglighet, säkerhet, skalbarhet, prestanda och regelefterlevnad.
* Merparten av tiden kommer du skriva kod och bidra till teamet på samma sätt som de andra utvecklarna.


 Du blir en del av ett nytt och växande team. Teamet ingår i produktorganisationen och som en del av en större produktarea, där du rapporterar till Engineering Manager för arean. Penningtvättsfrågor spänner sig däremot över hela kundresan och berör flera delar av våra produkter och tjänster. Det innebär mycket tvärfunktionellt samarbete med många av kundens produktteam och stödfunktioner.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker dig som har mångårig erfarenhet av modern systemutveckling, särskilt inom Java, och som kan mikrotjänstarkitektur. Med din bakgrund i tekniskt ledande roller har du format arkitektur och visioner för nya tjänster, du vet hur man balanserar stegvisa leveranser med långsiktiga mål.
   

  

 I rollen krävs också en passion för programmering och du trivs med att växla mellan strategiskt tänkande och hands-on utveckling. Vi söker en Arkitekt som uppskattar att arkitektrollen inte alltid står i centrum, utan sker i periodvisa insatser. Du behöver vara ödmjuk och prestigelös, redo att kavla upp ärmarna och arbeta sida vid sida med teamet.
   

  

 Som Lösningsarkitekt behöver du vara bekväm med att delta i upphandlingar och sätta tekniska krav. Du är skicklig på att skapa relationer och bygga förtroende, samtidigt som du engagerar andra i dina idéer. Du ser utmaningar som möjligheter och säkerställer struktur i allt du gör.
   

  

**Vi Tror Att Du Har**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med egenutvecklade och inköpta system.
* Erfarenhet av upphandling och utvärdering av tredjepartssystem.
* Erfarenhet av tvärfunktionella, agila team.
* Djup förståelse för regelverksstyrda verksamheter och deras tekniska påverkan.
* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift.

title: IT Product Architect
description:
**Join our Team**
**About The Opportunity**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated DevOps Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a DevOps Engineer, you will play a key role in enhancing the stability, efficiency, and overall performance of our Core network infrastructure. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in Juniper networking, with expertise in Routing, MPLS, DC-LAN/VXLAN. In addition, the candidate must possess a deep understanding of on-premises network infrastructure and proficiency in incident handling and change implementation. Experience with NW automation with Ansible and Python is a significant plus.
   

  

 The ICT DevOps Engineer works closely with business to understand stakeholder requirements and are involved in the full life cycle of a product.
   

  

 Typical Interfaces
   

  

* Product Area
* Business


**What You Will Do**
* Design, Implement and manage Core network solutions in Data Center and Ericsson sites.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the stability, performance, and efficiency of our network infrastructure.
* Implement incident handling procedures for Core network environments, respond promptly to incidents.
* Lead change implementation processes, ensuring smooth transitions in Core network environments.
* Plan and implement customer request for routing and port configuration to deliver connectivity to Core network environment.
* Implement and Optimize IAC practices, ensuring the automation and scalability of network configuration across Core network environments.
* Act in accordance with the agile methodology principles.


**The Skills You Bring**
* Minimum of 5 years of experience in Networking.
* Proven experience in MPLS, Routing and VXLAN, with focus on Juniper routers and switches.
* Strong understanding of Core network infrastructure and DC-LAN solutions.
* Hands-on experience with Incident handling and change implementation in Core network environments.
* Knowledge of Linux platforms and Kubernetes cloud native platforms.
* Understanding of Network Automation with Ansible and Python will be an added advantage.
* Relevant certifications (JNCIP) would be an added advantage


 Behavioral Competences
   

  

* Working with people
* Relating and Networking
* Adapting and responding to change
* Analytical Thinking
* Creating and Innovating
* Delivers Results and Meeting Customer Expectations
* Planning and Organizing


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 765672

title: Environment Engineer
description:
**Join our Team**
 In the Product Integration Environment Release Automation department, we have several stakeholders from system management, development team, engineering environment, solution testing and customer units. It gives us a unique overview of the product development flow.
   

  

 You would work in a test program for a Packet Core Cloud Native product, with  non-functional test and test environment. You would guide and follow up on non-functional test case development, automation and processes. The focus would be on validating and improving the test channels in our in-house lab.
   

  

  

  

**What You Will Do**
  

  

 The job offers a variety with few recurrent tasks.  You need to enjoy working hands- on with new challenges and be an excellent trouble shooter.
   

  

* You will act as a bridge between test teams and the infrastructure teams to validate that new and modified test channels meet the requirements. Synchronize so that test environment evolution matches product maturity and evolution.
* You would  participate in development of test architecture e.g. prototyping work in the test [lab] environment.
* You would collaborate with Release program, development teams and Infrastructure / tools teams with regards to test tools, processes, test environment and test methods.
* You would continuously initiate activities to make testing more efficient and effective. drive improvements and give input to the test and lab strategy.
* You would collect, optimize, and visualize the lab need and usage with close collaboration with the Infrastructure teamand Test Architects. Spread awareness regarding the efficient and effective usage of our test channels.


**What You Will Bring**
* Test Knowledge: Knowledge about SW Quality Assurance, test frameworks, CI/CD tools and technology stacks.
* Knowledge about the 4G/5G Packet Core products and Could Native.
* Problem solving: You need to enjoy and excel at trouble shooting. You generate innovations and come up with concepts of how to make our testing more effective. You create scripts in Python to facilitate work if needed.
* Understanding HW architecture, switches, and route protocol would be an advantage. It is good to have hands on experience with RH OpenShift and Ericsson’s Cloud Execution Environment.
* Communication skills: As you work with many different stakeholders you need to be able to adapt your communication to the given situation.
* Degree: BSc/MSc degree in Computer Science, Engineering Physics, Mathematics, Telecommunication or the equivalent level of knowledge.


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Poland (PL) || Krakow
